name: lidarr
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing a lidarr application.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`lidarr` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/devopsarr/terraform-provider-lidarr).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing a lidarr application.
nodejs.readme:

> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-lidarr` repo](https://github.com/MaienM/pulumi-lidarr/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,

apiKey.description: API key for Lidarr authentication. Can be specified via the `LIDARR_API_KEY` environment variable.

url.description:
Full Lidarr URL with protocol and port (e.g. `https://test.lidarr.audio:8686`). You should **NOT** supply any path
(`/api`), the SDK will use the appropriate paths. Can be specified via the `LIDARR_URL` environment variable.

additionalTags.description: Additional tags, `0` TitleSlug, `1` Quality, `2` Language, `3` ReleaseGroup, `4` Year, `5` Indexer, `6` Network.

intialState.description: Initial state, with Stop support. `0` Start, `1` ForceStart, `2` Pause, `3` Stop.

grabFields.description: Grab fields. `0` Overview, `1` Rating, `2` Genres, `3` Quality, `4` Group, `5` Size, `6` Links, `7` Release, `8` Poster, `9` Fanart.

importFields.description: Import fields. `0` Overview, `1` Rating, `2` Genres, `3` Quality, `4` Codecs, `5` Group, `6` Size, `7` Languages, `8` Subtitles, `9` Links, `10` Release, `11` Poster, `12` Fanart.

notificationType.description: Notification type. `0` Info, `1` Success, `2` Warning, `3` Failure.

includeCustomFormatWhenRenaming.description: Include custom format when renaming flag.

ignoreds.description: Ignored terms. At least one of `required` and `ignored` must be set.

requireds.description: Required terms. At least one of `required` and `ignored` must be set.

provider.description:
The provider type for the lidarr package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

apiKey.description: API key for Lidarr authentication. Can be specified via the `LIDARR_API_KEY` environment variable.

url.description:
Full Lidarr URL with protocol and port (e.g. `https://test.lidarr.audio:8686`). You should **NOT** supply any path
(`/api`), the SDK will use the appropriate paths. Can be specified via the `LIDARR_URL` environment variable.

lidarr:Artists/artist:Artist.description:
<!-- subcategory:Artists -->Artist resource.
For more information refer to [Artists](https://wiki.servarr.com/lidarr/library#artists) documentation.

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as lidarr from "@maienm/pulumi-lidarr";

const example = new lidarr.artists.Artist("example", {
    artistName: "Queen",
    foreignArtistId: "0383dadf-2a4e-4d10-a46a-e9e041da8eb3",
    metadataProfileId: 1,
    monitored: true,
    path: "/music/Queen",
    qualityProfileId: 1,
});
```
```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_lidarr as lidarr

example = lidarr.artists.Artist("example",
    artist_name="Queen",
    foreign_artist_id="0383dadf-2a4e-4d10-a46a-e9e041da8eb3",
    metadata_profile_id=1,
    monitored=True,
    path="/music/Queen",
    quality_profile_id=1)
```
```csharp
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using Pulumi;
using Lidarr = MaienM.Lidarr;

return await Deployment.RunAsync(() => 
{
    var example = new Lidarr.Artists.Artist("example", new()
    {
        ArtistName = "Queen",
        ForeignArtistId = "0383dadf-2a4e-4d10-a46a-e9e041da8eb3",
        MetadataProfileId = 1,
        Monitored = true,
        Path = "/music/Queen",
        QualityProfileId = 1,
    });

});
```

```go
func main() {
	pulumi.Run(func(ctx *pulumi.Context) error {
		_, err := Artists.NewArtist(ctx, "example", &Artists.ArtistArgs{
			ArtistName:        pulumi.String("Queen"),
			ForeignArtistId:   pulumi.String("0383dadf-2a4e-4d10-a46a-e9e041da8eb3"),

}
```

lidarr:DownloadClients/downloadClient:Do.description:
<!-- subcategory:Download Clients -->Generic Download Client resource. When possible use a specific resource instead.
For more information refer to [Download Client](https://wiki.servarr.com/lidarr/settings#download-clients).

{{% examples %}}
## Example Usage
{{% example %}}

```typescript
import * as pulumi from "@pulumi/pulumi";
import * as lidarr from "@maienm/pulumi-lidarr";

const example = new lidarr.downloadclients.DownloadClient("example", {
    configContract: "TransmissionSettings",
    enable: true,
    host: "transmission",
    implementation: "Transmission",
    name: "Example",
    port: 9091,
    priority: 1,
    protocol: "torrent",
    urlBase: "/transmission/",
});
```
```python
import pulumi
import pulumi_lidarr as lidarr

example = lidarr.download_clients.DownloadClient("example",
    config_contract="TransmissionSettings",
    enable=True,
    host="transmission",
    implementation="Transmission",
    name="Example",
    port=9091,
    priority=1,
    protocol="torrent",
    url_base="/transmission/")
```

```csharp
        UrlBase = "/transmission/",

});
```

```typescript
    name: "example-lossless",

                id: 7,
                name: "ALAC",

                name: "FLAC",
            },
        ],
    }],
    upgradeAllowed: true,
});
```

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getMediaManagement.

downloadPropersRepacks.description: Download proper and repack policy. valid inputs are: 'preferAndUpgrade', 'doNotUpgrade', and 'doNotPrefer'.

extraFileExtensions.description: Comma separated list of extra files to import (.nfo will be imported as .nfo-orig).

fileDate.description: Define the file date modification. valid inputs are: 'none', 'localAirDate, and 'utcAirDate'.

importExtraFiles.description: Import extra files. If enabled it will leverage 'extra*file*extensions'.

minimumFreeSpace.description: Minimum free space in MB to allow import.

rescanAfterRefresh.description: Rescan after refresh policy. valid inputs are: 'always', 'afterManual' and 'never'.

skipFreeSpaceCheck.description: Skip free space check before importing.
